246:1: asatkṛtānāmapi satpuruṣāṇāṃ pūrvopakāriṣvanukampā na śithilībhavati kṛtajñatvāt kṣamāsātmyācca|
246:3: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān mahābodhirnāma parivrājako babhūva|
246:4: sa gṛhasthabhāva eva parividitakramavyāyāmo lokābhimatānāṃ vidyāsthānānāṃ kṛtajñānakautūhalaścitrāsu ca kalāsu pravrajyāśrayāllokahitodyogācca viśeṣavattaraṃ dharmaśāstreṣvavahitamatisteṣvācāryakaṃ padamavāpa|
246:5: sa kṛtapuṇyatvājjñānamāhātmyāllokajñatayā pratipattiguṇasauṣṭhavācca yatra yatra gacchati sma tatra tatraiva viduṣāṃ vidvatpriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmanyatīrthikānāṃ ca pravrajitānāmabhigamanīyo bhāvanīyaśca babhūva|
246:6: guṇā hi puṇyāśrayalabdhadīptayo gatāḥ priyatvaṃ pratipattiśobhayā|
246:8: atha sa mahātmā lokānugrahārthamanuvicaran grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhāṇīranyatamasya rājño viṣāyāntaramupajāgāma|
246:9: śrutagunavistaraprabhavastu sa rājā tasyāgamanaṃ dūrata evopalabhya prītamanā ramaṇīye svasminnudyānavanapradeśe tasyāvasathaṃ kārayāmāsa|
246:10: abhyudgamanādisatkārapuraḥsaraṃ cainaṃ praveśya svaviṣayaṃ śiṣya ivācāryaṃ paricaraṇaparyupāsanavidhinā saṃmānayāmāsa|
246:13: bodhisattvo'pi cainaṃ śrutihṛdayahlādinībhirdharmyābhiḥ kathābhiḥ śreyomārgamanupratipādayamānaḥ pratyahamanujagrāha|
246:18: atha tasya rājño'mātyā labdhavidvatsaṃbhāvanā labdhasaṃmānāśca sadasyāḥ pratyahamabhivardhamānasatkārāṃ bodhisattvasya guṇasamṛddhimīrṣyopahatabuddhitvānna sehire|
246:21: prasahya cainaṃ śāstrakathāsvabhibhavitumaśaktā dharmaprasaṅgamamṛṣyamāṇāśca rājñastena tena krameṇa rājānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prati vigrāhayāmāsuḥ-nārhati devo bodhiparivrājake viśvāsamupagantum|
246:22: vyaktamayaṃ devasya guṇapriyatāṃ dharmābhimukhatāṃ copalabhya vyasanapratāraṇaślakṣṇaṭhamadhuravacanaḥ pravṛttisaṃcāraṇaheturabhūtaḥ kasyāpi pratyarthino rājño nipuṇaḥ praṇidhiprayogaḥ|
246:23: tathā hi dharmātmako nāma bhūtvā devamekāntena kāruṇyapravṛttau hrīdainye ca samanuśāsti,
246:24: arthakāmoparodhiṣu ca kṣatradharmabāhyeṣvāsannāpanayeṣu dharmasamādāneṣu dayānuvṛttyā ca nāma te kṛtyapakṣamāśvāsanavidhinopagṛṇīte priyasaṃstavaścānyarājadūtaiḥ|
246:27: atha tasya rājñaḥ punaḥ punarbhedopasaṃhitaṃ hitamiva bahubhirucyamānasya bodhisattvaṃ prati pariśaṅkāsaṃkocitasnehagauravaprasaramanyādṛśaṃ cittamabhavat|
246:30: atha sa rājā visrambhavirahanmandībhutapremabahumānastasmin mahāsattve na yathāpūrvaṃ satkāraprayogasumukho babhūva|
246:31: bodhisattvo'pi śuddhasvabhāvatvāt bahukāryavyāsaṅgā rājāna iti tanmanasi cakāra|
246:32: tatsamīpavartināṃ tu vinayopacāraśaithilyasaṃdarśanādviraktahṛdayamavetya rājānaṃ samādāya tridaṇḍāduṇḍikādyāṃ parivrājakabhāṇḍikāṃ prakramaṇasavyāpāraḥ samabhavat|
246:33: tadupaśrutya sa rājā sāvaśeṣasnehatayā dākṣiṇyavinayanuvṛttyā cainamabhigamya pradarśitasaṃbhramo vinivartayitukāma iva tamuvāca-
246:35: vyalīkaśaṅkājanakaṃ nu kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ pramādaskhalitaṃ tvayā naḥ||6||
246:38: abhajanatvaṃ tu gato'si śāṭhyāddharmasya tenāhamito vrajāmi||7||
246:39: athāsya sarabhasabhaṣitamativivṛtavadanamabhidravantaṃ vallabhaṃ śvānaṃ tatrāgatamabhipradarśayan punaruvāca-ayaṃ cātra mahārāja amānuṣaḥ sākṣinirdeśo dṛśyatām|
246:40: ayaṃ hi pūrvaṃ paṭucāṭukarmā bhūtvā mayi śvā bhavato'nuvṛttyā|
246:42: tvattaḥ śrutaṃ kiṃcidanena nūnaṃ madantare bhaktivipattirukṣam|
246:44: atha sa rājā tatpratyadeśād vrīḍāvanāmitavadanastena cāsya matinaipuṇyena samāvarjitamatirjātasaṃvego nedānīṃ śāṭhyānuvṛttikāla iti bodhisattvamabhipraṇamyovāca-
246:45: tvadāśrayā kacidabhūtkathaiṣā saṃprastutā naḥ sadasi pragalbhaiḥ|
246:46: upekṣitā kāryavaśānmayā ca tatkṣamyatāṃ tiṣṭha ca sādhu mā gāḥ||10||
246:47: bodhisattva uvāca-naiva khalvahaṃ mahārāja asatkāraprakṛtatvādakṣamayā vā praṇudyamāṇo gacchāmi|
246:48: na tvayaṃ mahārāja avasthānakāla iti na tiṣṭhāmi|
246:50: vimadhyabhāvādapi hīnaśobhe yāyāṃ na satkāravidhau svayaṃ cet|
246:53: ekāvamānābhihatā hi satsu pūrvopakārā na samībhavanti||12||
246:57: sukhārthinaḥ kleśaparāṅmukhasya lokaprasiddhaḥ sphuṭa eṣa mārgaḥ||14||
246:60: asevanā cātyupasevanā ca yācñābhiyogāśca dahanti maitrīm|
246:65: bodhisattva uvāca-bahvantarāyo mahārāja bahūpadravapratyarthikatvāllokasaṃniveśa iti na śakyametadavadhāraṇayā pratijñātumāgamiṣyāmīti|
246:67: ityanunīya sa māhatmā taṃ rājānaṃ kṛtābhyanujñāsatkārastena rājñā tadviṣayātpracakrāma|
246:68: sa tena gṛhijanasaṃstavenākulitahṛdayo'nyatamadaraṇyāyatanamupaśritya dhyānābhiyuktamatistatra viharannacireṇeva catvāri dhyānāni pañcābhijñāḥ pratilebhe|
246:69: tasya samasvāditapraśamasukharasasya smṛtiranukampanusāriṇī taṃ rājānaṃ prati prādurabhūt-kā nu khalu tasya rājño'vastheti|
246:70: athainaṃ dadarśa tairamātyairyathābhiniviṣṭāni dṛṣṭigatāni prait pratāryamāṇam|
246:92: apara enaṃ kṣatravidyāparidṛṣṭeṣu nītikauṭilyaprasaṅgeṣu nairghṛṇyamalineṣu dharmavirodhiṣvapi rājadharmo'yamiti samanuśaśāsa-
246:96: kṛtye tu yajña iva te paśavo niyojyāḥ||21||
246:97: iti te'mātyāstaṃ rājānaṃ tena tena dṛṣṭikṛtonmārgeṇa netumīṣuḥ|
246:101: atha bodhisattvaḥ idamatra prāptakālamiti viniścitya svasminnāśramapade mahāntaṃ vānaramabhinirmāya ṛddhiprabhāvāttasya carmāpanīya śeṣamantardhāpayāmāsa|
246:102: sa tannirmitaṃ mahadvānaracarma bibhrattasya nṛpaterbhavanadvāre prādurabhūt|
246:103: niveditābhyāgamanaśca dauvārikairyathākramamāyudhīyaguptaparyantāmamātyadvijayodhadūpapauramukhyābhikīrṇāṃ vinītadhīrodāttaveṣajanāṃ sāsiyaṣṭibhiḥ pratihārairadhiṣṭhitapradvārāṃ siṃhāsanāvaśtitanarādhipāmanākulāṃ rājaparṣadamavajagāhe|
246:104: pratyudgamanādividhinā cātithijanopacāreṇa pratipūjyamānaḥ kṛtapratisaṃmodanakathāsatkārāsanābhinirhāraśca tena rājñā kautūhalānuvṛttyā vānaracarmapratilambhaṃ pratyanuyuktaḥ-kenedamāryāya vānaracarmopanayatā mahatānugraheṇātmā saṃyojita iti|
246:105: bodhisattva uvāca-mayaivedaṃ mahārāja svayamadhigataṃ nānyena kenacidupahṛtam|
246:106: kuśatṛṇamātrāstīrṇāyāṃ hi pṛthivyāṃ svabhāvakaṭhināyāṃ niṣaṇṇena svapatā vā pratapyamānaśarīreṇa na sukhaṃ dharmavidhiranuṣṭhiyate|
246:107: ayaṃ ca mayāśramapade mahān vānaro dṛṣṭaḥ|
246:108: tasya me buddhirabhavat-upapannaṃ bata me dharmasādhanamidamasya vānarasya carma|
246:109: śakyamatra niṣaṇṇena svapatā vā parārdhyāstaraṇāstīrṇebhyo rājaśayanebhyo'pi nivṛttaspṛheṇa svadharmavidhiranuṣṭhātumiti mayā tasyedaṃ carma pragṛhītam|
246:111: tacchrutvā sa rājā dākṣiṇyavinayānuvṛttyā na bodhisattvaṃ kiṃcitpratyuvāca|
246:113: atha te'mātyāḥ pūrvamapi tasmin mahāsattve sāmarṣahṛdayā labdhavacanāvakāśatvātpravikasitavadanā rājānamūdīkṣya bodhisattvamupadarśayanta ūcuḥ-aho bhagavato dharmanurāgaikarasā matiḥ|
246:116: āśramapadamabhigata eva mahānnāma vānara ekākinā tapaḥkṣāmaśarīreṇa praśamita ityāścaryam|
246:118: athainānasaṃrabdha eva bodhisattvaḥ pratyuvāca-nārhantyatrabhavantaḥ svavādaśobhānirapekṣamityasmān vigarhitum|
246:123: iti sa mahātmā tānamātyān sāmānyenopālabhya pratyekaśaḥ punarupālabdhukāmastamahetuvādinamāmantryovāca-
246:127: pāpaṃ kṛto mama yataḥ suhato mayāyam||24||
246:128: atha pāpamasti mama tasya vadhānnanu hetutastaditi siddhamidam|
246:129: tadahetuvādamidamutsṛja vā vada vātra yattava na yuktamiva||25||
246:130: yadi padmanālaracanādi ca yattadahetukaṃ nanu sadaiva bhavet|
246:131: salilādībījakṛtameva tu tat sati tatra saṃbhavati na hyasati||26||
246:134: na heturastīti vadan sahetukaṃ nanu pratijñā svayameva hāpayet|
246:135: athāpi hetupraṇayālaso bhavet pratijñayā kevalayāsya kiṃ bhavet||27||
246:136: ekatra kvacidanavekṣya yaśca hetuṃ tenaiva pravadati sarvahetvabhāvam|
246:137: prtyakṣaṃ nanu tadavetya hetusāraṃ taddveṣī bhavati virodhaduṣṭavākyaḥ||28||
246:138: na lakṣyate yadi kuhacicca kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ nu tad dṛḍhamasadeva bhāṣase|
246:139: na dṛśyate sadapi hi kāraṇāntarāddinātyaye vimalavivārkamaṇḍalam||29||
246:141: sukhārthamiṣṭān viṣayān prapadyase niṣevituṃ necchasi tadvirodhinaḥ|
246:142: nṛpasya sevāṃ ca karoṣi tatkṛte na heturastīti ca nāma bhāṣase||30||
246:145: iti sa mahātmā tamahetuvādinaṃ viśadairhetubhirniṣpratibhaṃ kṛtvā tamīśvakāraṇikamamantrayovāca-āyuṣmānapyasmān nārhatyeva vigarhitum|
246:146: īśvaraḥ sarvasya hi te kāraṇamabhimataḥ| paśya-
246:147: kurute yadi sarvamīśvaro nanu tenaiva hataḥ sa vānaraḥ|
246:149: atha vānaravīravaiśasaṃ na kṛtaṃ tena dayānurodhinā|
246:155: ātmano hi vibhūtyā yaḥ karoti sa karjā||35||
246:157: tatr abhaktiniveśaḥ kaṃ guṇaṃ nu samīkṣya||36||
246:161: dharmato yadi na prāgīśvaraḥ sa tato'bhūt||38||
246:162: dāsataiva ca sā syādyā kriyeta pareṇa|
246:165: yadi kāraṇamīśvara eva vibhurjagato nikhilasya tavābhimataḥ|
246:166: nanu nārhasi mayyadhiropayituṃ vihitaṃ vibhunā kapirājavadham||40||
246:167: iti sa mahātmā tamīśvakāraṇikaṃ suśliṣṭairhetubhirmūkatāmivopanīya taṃ pūrvakarmakṛtavādinamāmantraṇāsauṣṭhavenābhimukhīkṛtyovāca-bhavānapyasmānna śobhate vikutsayamānaḥ|
246:173: pāpaṃ kimatra mama yena vigarhase mām||41||
246:174: athāsti pāpaṃ mama vānaraṃ ghnataḥ kṛtaṃ mayā tarhi na pūrvakarmaṇā|
246:175: yadiṣyate karma ca karmahetukaṃ na kaścidevaṃ sati mokṣameṣyati||42||
246:176: bhavecca saukhyaṃ yadi duḥkhahetuṣu sthitasya duḥkhaṃ sukhasādhaneṣu vā|
246:178: na dṛṣṭamevaṃ ca yataḥ sukhāsukhaṃ na pūrvakarmaikamato'sya kāraṇam|
246:179: bhavedabhāvaśca navasya karmaṇastadaprasiddhau ca purātanaṃ kutaḥ||44||
246:182: iti sa mahātmā niranuyojyairhetubhistasya maunavratamivopadiśya tamucchedavādinaṃ smitapūrvakamuvāca-āyuṣmataḥ ko'yamatyādaro'smadvigarhāyāṃ yadi tattvamucchedavādaṃ manyase?
246:183: lokaḥ paro yadi na kaścana kiṃ vivarjyaṃ
246:184: pāpaṃ śubhaṃ prati ca kiṃ bahumānamohaḥ|
246:186: devaṃ gate suhata eva ca vānaro'yam||46||
246:189: svakṛtāntapathāgataṃ sukhaṃ na samāpnoti ca lokaśaṅkayā|
246:197: vigarhaṇīyaḥ kiṃ hantā vānarasya narasya vā||50||
246:198: iti sa mahāsattvastamucchedavādinaṃ vispaṣṭaśobhenottarakrameṇa tūṣṇīṃbhāvaparāyaṇaṃ kṛtvā taṃ kṣatravidyāvidagdhamamātyamuvāca-bhavānapyasmān kasmāditi vikutsayate yadi nyāyyamarthaśāstraparidṛṣṭaṃ vidhiṃ manyase?
246:202: prayojanaṃ prāpya na cedavekṣyaṃ snigdheṣu bandhuṣvapi sādhuvṛttam|
246:203: hate mayā carmaṇi vānare'smin kā śāstradṛṣṭe'pi naye vigarhā||52||
246:204: dayāviyogādatha garhaṇīyaṃ karmedṛśaṃ dūḥkhaphalaṃ ca dṛṣṭam|
246:205: yatrābhyanujñātamidaṃ na tantre prapadyase kena mukhena tattvam||53||
246:206: iyaṃ vibhūtiśca nayasya yatra tatrānayaḥ kidṛśavibhramaḥ syāt|
246:209: śāstraprasiddhena nayena gacchan na garhaṇīyo'smi kapervadhena||55||
246:210: iti sa mahātmā jitaparṣatkān paricitaprāgalbhyānapi ca tānamātyān prasahyābhibhūya samāvarjitahṛdayāṃ ca sarājikāṃ parṣadamavetya teṣāṃ vānaravadhahṛllekhavinayanārthaṃ rājānamābabhāṣe-naiva ca khalvahaṃ mahārāja prāṇinaṃ vānaraṃ hatavān|
246:212: nirmitasya hi vānarasyedaṃ carma mayā gṛhītamasyaiva kathākramasya prastāvārtham|
246:214: ityuktvā tamṛddhyābhisaṃskāraṃ pratisaṃhṛtya parayā ca mātrayābhiprasāditamānasaṃ rājānaṃ saparṣatkamavetyovāca-
246:221: dṛṣṭyanvayaṃ hi pravikalpya tattadvāgbhiḥ kriyābhiśca vidarśayanti||58||
246:225: vinirdahantaḥ khalu bāliśaṃ janaṃ kudṛṣṭibhirdṛṣṭiviṣā ivoragāḥ||60||
246:227: ato na tānarhati sevituṃ budhaścarettadarthaṃ tu parākrame sati||61||
246:228: loke virūḍhayaśasāpi tu naiva kāryā kāryārthamapyasadṛśena janena maitrī|
246:231: svāṃ kirtimujjvalaya saṃjanayan prajānāṃ doṣānurāgavilayaṃ guṇasauhṛdaṃ ca||63||
246:232: tvayi ca carati dharma bhūyasāyaṃ nṛlokaḥ
246:237: maitraṃ manaḥ kuru jane svajane yathaiva|
246:254: drumadyathāmaṃ pracinoti yaḥ phalaṃ sa hanti bījaṃ na rasaṃ ca vindati|
246:255: adharmyamevaṃ balimuddharannṛpaḥ kṣiṇoti deśaṃ na ca tena nandati||70||
246:256: yathā tu saṃpūrṇaguṇo mahoruhaḥ phalodayaṃ pākavaśātprayacchati|
246:258: hitānamātyānnipuṇārthadarśinaḥ śucīni mitrāṇi janaṃ svameva ca|
246:259: badhāna cetassu tadiṣṭayā girā dhanaiśca saṃmānanayopapāditaiḥ||72||
246:260: tasmāddharmaṃ tvaṃ puraskṛtya nityaṃ śreyaḥprāptau yuktacetāḥ prajānām|
246:262: iti sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭikṛtakāpathādvivecya samavatārya ca sanmārgaṃ saparṣatkaṃ tata eva gaganatalaṃ samutpatya prāñjalinā tena janena sabahumānapraṇatena pratyarcyamānastadevāraṇyāyatanaṃ pratijagāma|
246:263: tadevamasatkṛtānāmapi satpuruṣāṇāṃ pūrvopakāriṣvanukampā na śithilībhavati kṛtajñatvātkṣamāsātmyācca|
246:265: evaṃ sa bhagavānanabhisaṃbuddho'pi paravādānabhibhūya sattvavinayaṃ kṛtavāniti buddhavarṇe'pi vācyam|
